pages.text: $(li)The Iron Nugget is a hard part of the Iron Ingot that can be crafted placing a Iron Ingot in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can obtain it Smelting Iron Armors, Weapons and Tools in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/blast_furnace)Blast $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l)$(/l).

$(li)This item can be used in multiple crafts in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)Chains$(li)Hanging Sign$(li)Lanterns$(li)Iron Ingot$(li)Iron Ladder$(li)Enderiophage Rocket$(li)Redstone Lantern$(li)Goblet$(li)Blank Lock$(li)Blank Key$(li)North Compass$(li)Sconces
$(li)Candle Holder$(li)Iron Gate$(br)$(li)Some mobs like Garches, Gobs, or Hobgobs may drop it too.
